column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2022
column14: I would give this less than 5 stars if I already knew how small the bottle was but, since I didn’t look at the oz or the reviews I can’t bring myself to do it since it was my fault from the get go blindly buying this lol. I love their products they smell amazing and make my skin feel amazing!  Product wise 5 stars size wise and for the price of the size I give it 2 stars!  I thought I was getting a steal on this when I saw it for $10 lol maybe that’s why I didn’t look at anything else :/

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2021
column14: This was a tropical dream. Lathered very well . The smell is absolutely delicious like saltwater and a sweet nutty treat, with a praline base. Excellent for shaving. Very moisturizing. I followed up with the Coco Cabana Cream and body spray. Go ahead ladies , show yourselves some love. So worth it. I'm ordering the full size now.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2020
column14: Not worth it, for $10.00 the bottle is sample size you need alot to get suds your lucky if you get 3 showers out it. If i could i would rate it a zero not worth it

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2021
column14: I love the product. The only thing I dislike is how tiny it is. It is a travel size product.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2020
column14: I love the coconut smell of summer and this cream delivers.  It kind of reminds me of Skin Trip, which I used to love wearing but haven't seen in ages. The consistency is somewhere between a lotion and a cream, and not greasy.  Heaven!  I keep putting it on and makes me happy wearing it.  A new fave for sure.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2021
column14: I love this stuff!  The body wash is the perfect compliment to the body cream.  I always get compliments on the scent.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2022
column14: The product smells amazing! It doesn't really lather, though, and it's way too expensive .

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2020
column14: Tiny travel bottle. I should have paid attention to the ounces but for the price I thought it would be a bit bigger.
